title: el che
author: el che
content: This year's FPL is upon us, with the first game week starting in less than 24 hours.The likes of stake.com and sportsbet.io had offered it's customers these last few years the possibility to join their private mini league with some very generous prizes.Unfortunately this year we haven't received any news that there will be another private league from stake or SB.As a big fan of FPL I am in the hunt for similar private mini leagues.If someone is aware of such promotions, it would be great to share the information with the community.Looking forward to another exciting FPL season and best of luck to all managers.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: Duelbits recently announced their FPL promotion (free to play) with a prize pool worth $100k. The only requirement is a duelbits account and you're good to go.BetFury also has an FPL promotion. The prizes are all in free bets worth $3000 and there's a $500 overall wagering requirement that's easy to clear by playing dice.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: If you haven't registered already, There's a mini league with a prize pool hosted by Trofo and ICOpress but there's a little caveat - an entry fee of 2mbtc. That and the Duelbits FPL promotion should be good to go for this season. There's still time before GW1 kickoff so we might still have some new promotion coming up here and there. Fingers crossed.

comments.author: Ayebabara
comments.body: Op this is misplacement of thread so I advise you to move this thread to the Gambling Discussion Section which here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=228.0.  This thread is discussing things concerning sport so move it there. Thanks for your understanding.

comments.author: el che
comments.body: Quote from: Ayebabara on August 10, 2023, 10:48:48 PMOp this is misplacement of thread so I advise you to move this thread to the Gambling Discussion Section which here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=228.0.  This thread is discussing things concerning sport so move it there. Thanks for your understanding. Oh ok I wasn't aware, sure, I will move it now. Thank you!

comments.author: alegotardo
comments.body: Quote from: ralle14 on August 10, 2023, 09:39:36 PMDuelbits recently announced their FPL promotion (free to play) with a prize pool worth $100k. The only requirement is a duelbits account and you're good to go.That's cool, I've been a Duelbits user for a long time, in addition to participating in its subscription campaign since the beginning.$100k is a huge prize pool, good to see that Duelbits is also investing in this event and with no player limitations.I've been looking at the rules now and I'd just like to highlight some that I thought were very important for anyone signing up for Duelbits....The first and most important thing is to do this through the event's promotional page after being logged in, only then will it be possible to link the Fantasy Premier League account to Duelbits.Another important point is the need for KYC if you win any prizes, so if you value the anonymity of your identity, do not aim to win a prize with this event.Good luck and good games everyone!
